about_the_game:
About This Game


a game to see the scenery
'CallOfTree' is a first-person shooter game that requires a high-spec PC of a gamer made with Unreal Engine 5.
The difficulty level is very easy and the purpose of this game is to see beautiful scenery.

It's a very simple structure game where you just have to follow the road. Along the road, there are trees you can talk to.
The trees will tell you where to go.
You have to shoot out the intruders who sometimes appear.
It's a story about a gamer who went to another world saving the world.

First person/3rd person can be changed and stored on a level-by-level basis
One level has about 10 minutes of play time


I used the latest version 5.1 of Unreal Engine
I tried to add DLSS, but it was put on hold because the usage changed as the Unreal version was upgraded to 5.1
Developer computer's RTX3070 produces at least 30 frames and an average of 40 frames with the 2k High option.
detailed_description:
About This Game


a game to see the scenery
'CallOfTree' is a first-person shooter game that requires a high-spec PC of a gamer made with Unreal Engine 5.
The difficulty level is very easy and the purpose of this game is to see beautiful scenery.

It's a very simple structure game where you just have to follow the road. Along the road, there are trees you can talk to.
The trees will tell you where to go.
You have to shoot out the intruders who sometimes appear.
It's a story about a gamer who went to another world saving the world.

First person/3rd person can be changed and stored on a level-by-level basis
One level has about 10 minutes of play time


I used the latest version 5.1 of Unreal Engine
I tried to add DLSS, but it was put on hold because the usage changed as the Unreal version was upgraded to 5.1
Developer computer's RTX3070 produces at least 30 frames and an average of 40 frames with the 2k High option.
name: CallOfTree

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690k (3.3 GHz) AMD FX-8300 (3.3 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB, GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700k (3.7 GHz) AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB, GeForce RTX 3070 Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

short_description: Fisrt Person Shooting Game And Beautiful scenery. The story is about a bad god named Gideon tormented humans and a tree that couldn't stand summoned a warrior from another world in a chaotic situation due to the war of the gods The trees are all unique, so you can easily find trees to interact with
